entities.name: beedle the bard
entities.description: A book mentioned by Hermione as containing a mark.

entities.name: the life and lies of albus dumbledore
entities.description: A book shown to Harry by Hermione with a photograph of the original letter written by Dumbledore.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The former headmaster of Hogwarts who wrote a letter to Grindelwald and had his signature in The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: A dark wizard mentioned as the recipient of a letter written by Dumbledore.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: A location where an old grave was found with the triangular mark.

relationships.description: Dumbledore wrote a letter to Grindelwald.
The signature of Dumbledore in The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore is similar to the mark found in Beedle the Bard.
